Deutschtreff für Geflüchtete - jeden zwe: German language meet-up for refugees - Every other tuesday from 18:00 to 20:00 in the Tommasini in Lenzburg
Der Deutschtreff findet an folgenden Dat: The meet-up will take place on these dates:
Bis Haltestelle \"Bachstrasse\": Get off at the "Bachstrasse" bus stop
Teilnehmenden können wir 50% der Billetk: We can pay 50% of ticket costs for participants.
Wir sind im Tommasini in Lenzburg. Das T:
We're in the "Tommasini" in lenzburg. The Tommasini can be reached easily on foot, by bicycle or public transport.
Parking spaces for cars and bicycles are available.
Coming from the lenzburg train station, the Tommasini can be reached in about 15 minutes. The bus line 391, coming from lenzburg train station, also stops nearby.
Schön, bist Du auf uns aufmerksam geword:
We're happy, that you found us! "Vo Ergendwo" offers a relaxed atmosphere, where fun and games are just as important as learning german or doing homework. 
Apart from helping you learn german, we can help you apply for jobs, understand official letters, and help you with other challenges. Our meet-up is free for all participants. If you're interested, just come by!
Du kannst uns eine Nachricht mit dem Kon: You can send us a message using this form. Leave your e-mail address or phone number, and we'll get back to you.
Name: Name
Deine Nachricht wurde versendet. Wir mel: Your message was sent! We'll get in touch via e-mail or phone!
This section is addressed to people inte: This section is addressed to people interested in helping us conduct the language meet-up, and other activities. Therefore, it is only available in german.
Feier am 22. Februar mit uns das 4-Jähri: Celebrate the fourth anniversary of the language meet-up with us
Neben Essen aus aller Welt erwarten dich: Food from all corners of the world, an open stage, bands and DJs will be waiting for you.
Weitere Informationen folgen bald: More information will be provided soon
